div.em: Current conditions as of 19 Apr 13:53 pm CDT

div.div: A 10 percent chance of rain after 5pm. Mostly sunny, with a high near 59. South wind around 5 mph.

A chance of rain and thunderstorms before 1am, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between 1am and 3am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 36. South southeast wind 5 to 10 mph becoming northwest after midnight. Chance of precipitation is 40%.
Sunny, with a high near 67. Breezy, with a northwest wind 5 to 10 mph increasing to 15 to 20 mph in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 30 mph.

li.a: Watch this space for important notifications.
